mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard (fb_category, fb_title, fb_content, member_userId) VALUES (#{fb_category}, #{fb_title}, #{fb_content}, #{member_userId})

mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET fb_category = #{fb_category}, fb_title = #{fb_title}, fb_content = #{fb_content} WHERE fb_number = #{fb_number}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = #{fb_number} AND member_userId = #{member_userId}
